item.title: Mikelangelo
item.description: Who is mikelangelo Mikelangelo is a Virtual Private Server hosted on ~okeanos cloud infrastructure. This service is provided by Greek National Network, Cloud Computing and IT infrastructure and services provider, GRNET. Mikelangelo operates on GNU/Linux Debian Stretch with kernel version 4.9.0-8-amd64 The infrastructure consists: 2 x CPU cores 4096 MB RAM memory 20 GB Boot disk (also /dev/vda1) mounted on / 80 GB Data disk (also /dev/vdb) mounted on /data Network IPv4 83.

Interests Web Development & Cloud Computing Deep/Machine Learning Image Processing & NeuroImaging Internet of Things & Metadata Interoperability Software Defined Radios & Signal Processing Education National Technical University of Athens Diploma in Electrical and Computer Engineering 2008-2018 Publications N. Kalatzis, G. Routis, Y. Marinellis, M. Avgeris, I. Roussaki, S. Papavassiliou and M. Anagnostou Semantic Interoperability for IoT Platforms in Support of Decision Making: An Experiment on Early Wildfire Detection, Sensors 2019, 19, 528.

item.title: About
item.description: Dear friend, My Temporary Autonomous Zone corner was inspired by the so-called book of Hakim Bey. I just consider it a gist, an entry point to the zone. With all the best, ~yiorgos
